definitions.body: in Judah Jos 15:25 (ai( po/leiv; whence, as supposed, Judas [[אִישׁ קְרִיּוֹת]]), perh. Ḳaryatên, c. 12 m. S. of Hebron, Buhl:Geogr. 182.

in Moab, Kariwq, ai( po/leiv; MI:13 [[קרית]]: Je 48:24, ´[[הַקּ]]: v:Je 48:41, Am 2:2; perh. = Rabbaq Mwab = Moab = Areopoliv (Euseb., v. Lag:Onom. 277, 60 al.), mod.Rabba, c. 11 m. S. of Arnon, cf. Buhl:Geogr. 270.
